  <identifier>
    <catalog>OpenLearn</catalog>
    <entry>Darwin_1</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:Darwin_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>Darwin_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Studying Darwin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studieren Von von Darwin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étudier Darwin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudando Darwin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studiare Darwin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελέτη Δαρβίνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estudiar Darwin</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">This unit brings together a collection of units from the OpenLearn site that would be of interest to anyone wishing to study Darwin’s theory of evolution and natural selection and how his work has gone on to influence other work around this theory.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit bringt eine Ansammlung 
Maßeinheiten von der OpenLearn Site zusammen, die vom Interesse zu 
jedermann sein würde, das Darwin?s Theorie der Entwicklung und der 
natürlichen Auswahl studieren möchte und von wie seine Arbeit 
fortgefahren hat, andere Arbeit um diese Theorie zu beeinflussen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité rassemble une collection d'unités 
du site d'OpenLearn qui serait d'intérêt à n'importe qui souhaitant
étudier la théorie de Darwin?s d'évolution et de sélection normale
et de la façon dont son travail a continué pour influencer l'autre 
travail autour de cette théorie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade traz junto uma coleção das 
unidades do local de OpenLearn que seria do interesse a qualquer um 
que deseja estudar a teoria de Darwin?s da evolução e da seleção 
natural e de como seu trabalho foi sobre influenciar o outro trabalho 
em torno desta teoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità riunisce una collezione di unità 
dal luogo di OpenLearn che sarebbe di interesse a chiunque che 
desidera studiare la teoria di Darwin?s di sviluppo e della selezione 
naturale e da come il suo lavoro ha continuato ad influenzare l'altro 
lavoro intorno a questa teoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα συγκεντρώνει μια συλλογή των μονάδων 
από την περιοχή OpenLearn που θα ήταν ενδιαφέρον ενδιαφέρον σε
καθένα που επιθυμεί να μελετήσει τη θεωρία Darwin?s της 
εξέλιξης και της φυσικής επιλογής και πώς η εργασία του έχει 
πάει για να επηρεαστεί άλλη εργασία γύρω από αυτήν την θεωρία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad reúne una colección de unidades del
sitio de OpenLearn que estaría de interés a cualquier persona que 
desea estudiar la teoría de Darwin?s de la evolución y de la 
selección natural y de cómo su trabajo ha continuado influenciar el 
otro trabajo alrededor de esta teoría.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Natur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e natureza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e natura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και φύση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y naturaleza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Biología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
